availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Henry Blakeman (Green County, Kentucky, farmhand.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmhand. Green County, Kentucky, native. Son of David Blakeman and Jane Blakeman. Married to Mary A. Edward Blakeman in Green County, Kentucky, on October 15, 1861. Resident of Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmhand in Green County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 1, p. 98A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, District 2, p. 563.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Green County, Precinct 1, p. 418A.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Green County Marriages, Film 001877085.
